class_notes:
(Permission of Instructor Required Prior to Enrollment)


"IVAC Capstone" Offered once a year, this capstone course is required of all graduating IVAC co-majors and focuses on professional practices including documentation, research, and development of an individual body of work situated in contemporary theory and methodology.
This class is a part of the Integrated Visual Arts Co-Major (IVAC) curriculum and does not count towards the Art History major, minor, or concentrations.
course_description: Offered once a year during the fall semester. This capstone course is required of all graduating IVAC co-majors and focuses on professional practices including documentation, research, development of an individual body of work situated in contemporary theory and methodology.
